trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="RecognizeCompleted" /> event raised by a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 为由 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 对象引发的 <see langword="RecognizeCompleted" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object raises its `SpeechRecognized` event after completing a `RecognizeAsync` operation.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>时，将创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>对象引发其`SpeechRecognized`后完成的事件`RecognizeAsync`操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about speech recognition events, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: 有关语音识别事件的详细信息，请参阅[使用语音识别事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)。

trans-unit.source: The following example performs asynchronous speech recognition on a speech recognition grammar, using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with the in-process recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例在语音识别语法上执行异步语音识别使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用进程内识别的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects to create the speech recognition grammar before building it into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象生成到之前创建语音识别语法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event outputs information about the recognition operation to the console.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件输出到控制台的识别操作有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input device's audio stream associated with the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取输入设备音频流中与 <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted" /> 事件关联的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location in the input device's audio stream associated with the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 输入设备的音频流中关联的 <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted" /> 事件的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 此属性引用所识别的短语中的输入的设备生成音频流开头的位置。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>属性引用其音频的输入内识别器的位置。

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 这些位置可以是不同的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用语音识别事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)。

trans-unit.source: The following example performs asynchronous speech recognition on a speech recognition grammar, using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with the in-process recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例在语音识别语法上执行异步语音识别使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用进程内识别的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects to create the speech recognition grammar before building it into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象生成到之前创建语音识别语法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event outputs information about the recognition operation to the console.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件输出到控制台的识别操作有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a babble timeout generated the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示干扰超时是否生成了 <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted" /> 事件的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> has detected only background noise for longer than was specified by its <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout" /> property; otherwise <see langword="false." />
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> ，如果 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> 检测到背景噪音比其 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout" /> 属性指定的时间长；否则 <see langword="false." />

trans-unit.source: The following example performs asynchronous speech recognition on a speech recognition grammar, using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with the in-process recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例在语音识别语法上执行异步语音识别使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用进程内识别的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects to create the speech recognition grammar before building it into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象生成到之前创建语音识别语法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event outputs information about the recognition operation to the console.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件输出到控制台的识别操作有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an initial silence timeout generated the <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示初始无声段超时是否生成了 <see cref="E:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted" /> 事件的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> has detected only silence for a longer time period than was specified by its <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout" /> property; otherwise <see langword="false." />
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> 检测到静止比其 <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout" /> 属性指定的时间长；否则 <see langword="false." />

trans-unit.source: The following example performs asynchronous speech recognition on a speech recognition grammar, using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with the in-process recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例在语音识别语法上执行异步语音识别使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用进程内识别的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects to create the speech recognition grammar before building it into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象生成到之前创建语音识别语法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event outputs information about the recognition operation to the console.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件输出到控制台的识别操作有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the input stream ended.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示输入流是否已结束。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the recognizer no longer has audio input; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果识别器不再具有音频输入；否则， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer sets this property to `true` when a file provides the input stream for the recognizer and the end of the file is reached.
trans-unit.target: 识别器将此属性设置为`true`时文件提供识别器输入的流，并在达到文件末尾。

trans-unit.source: The end of the input stream can coincide with a successful recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 输入流的末尾可以与成功的识别操作同时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using a file as the input stream, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用一个文件作为输入的流的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example performs asynchronous speech recognition on a speech recognition grammar, using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with the in-process recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例在语音识别语法上执行异步语音识别使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用进程内识别的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects to create the speech recognition grammar before building it into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象生成到之前创建语音识别语法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event outputs information about the recognition operation to the console.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件输出到控制台的识别操作有关的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: 获取识别结果。

trans-unit.source: The recognition result if the recognition operation succeeded; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果标识操作成功的标识结果；否则， <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>对象派生自<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>并且包含有关识别操作返回的短语的完整信息。

trans-unit.source: The following example performs asynchronous speech recognition on a speech recognition grammar, using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with the in-process recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例在语音识别语法上执行异步语音识别使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用进程内识别的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects to create the speech recognition grammar before building it into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象生成到之前创建语音识别语法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event outputs information about the recognition operation to the console.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件输出到控制台的识别操作有关的信息。
